criteria: Reading Comprehension of Complex Literary Texts
descriptions: Demonstrates no understanding of the text; unable to identify basic plot elements or themes.
Struggles to understand the text; identifies plot elements with significant inaccuracies; misinterprets themes.
Demonstrates a basic understanding of the text; identifies plot elements with some inaccuracies; struggles to articulate themes.
Demonstrates a satisfactory understanding of the text; accurately identifies most plot elements; articulates themes with some prompting.
Demonstrates a strong understanding of the text; accurately identifies plot elements and themes with minimal prompting; begins to analyze the author's choices.
Demonstrates a comprehensive understanding of the text; accurately identifies plot elements and themes independently; analyzes the author's choices and their impact on the text.
Provides no analysis or interpretation of the text.
Offers superficial analysis with no supporting evidence; interpretations are illogical or irrelevant.
Provides basic analysis with limited supporting evidence; interpretations are somewhat relevant but lack depth.
Offers reasonable analysis with adequate supporting evidence; interpretations are generally relevant and demonstrate some insight.
Provides insightful analysis with strong supporting evidence; interpretations are thoughtful and demonstrate a clear understanding of literary devices.
Offers sophisticated analysis with compelling supporting evidence; interpretations are original, insightful, and demonstrate a nuanced understanding of literary devices and their effect.
Provides no evidence from the text to support claims.
Attempts to use evidence, but it is irrelevant or inaccurately cited.
Uses limited evidence that is weakly connected to claims; citations may be inaccurate.
Uses relevant evidence to support claims, but connections could be stronger; citations are mostly accurate.
Uses strong and relevant evidence to effectively support claims; citations are accurate and well-integrated.
Uses compelling and insightful evidence to convincingly support claims; citations are flawless and enhance the analysis.
